title: ARAM TEAM - Serious ARAM players only.
body:
I'd like to find some other people who are as passionate about team fights, learning what items work well ( that ARENT the meta build )
learning your positioning, and learning how to undercut the enemy teams minions ability to push whilst allowing yours to push 10x harder.

I am fanatic about ARAM and find that it offers the best learning opportunity for those who are new to the team fighting situation and all that it entails.
as stated above
I would love to hear from people who are interested in learning, how to position themselves, learning who to focus as the champion they have been handed, and also those who know how to play the hand they've been dealt, considering it is ALL RANDOM ALL MID.


please, message me or just add me as a friend, I'd really enjoy playing with some other people who are as keen on ARAM as I am and truly understand it's value in teaching all the skills you really need to be effective in Summoners rift and Ranked.{{champion:99}}
